page.title: 10THE EDGE OF TOWN
page.content: TO THE NORTH AGAIN, AND ONLY CONNECTED BY THE WELFORD ROAD, IS ANOTHER, MORE MODERN, HOUSING ESTATE, STARTED IN THE 1970'S AND JUST BEING COMPLETED. THIS IS AN OPEN PLAN ESTATE WITH NO HEDGES OR FENCES TO THE FRONT GARDENS AND THIS TOGETHER WITH WIDE PAVEMENTS AND GRASS VERGES EITHER SIDE OF THE ROAD, GIVES A VERY SPACIOUS FEEL TO THE ESTATE.THE ROADS ARE ALL CURVED AND THERE IS A WIDE VARIETY OF HOUSES HERE. THERE IS A SMALL ROW OF SHOPS IN THE CENTRE BUT VERY LITTLE TRAFFIC AS THERE IS NO THROUGH ROAD AND ONLY ONE ENTRANCE AND EXIT TO THE ESTATE.THE CATS LIVING HERE WERE ABLE TO LIE QUITE PEACEFULLY IN THE FRONT DRIVEWAYS OF THE HOUSES AND THE ONLY SOUND TO DISTURB THE PEACE WAS THE OCCASIONAL RUMBLE IN THE DISTANCE AS A TRAIN PASSED BY ON THE NEARBY RAILWAY.
